com.viewlift.views.customviews

Class ViewCreator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.viewlift.views.customviews.ViewCreator

  • public class ViewCreator
extends java.lang.Object
    This class will utilize ingested AppCMS UI JSON and API data JSON files to dynamically create the views for entire pages, including the modules and component child views. It is used to create and return a PageView and will descend through to inspect all the child elements in the input AppCMS UI JSON responses. It will currently ignore the masthead and footer modules.

      • generatePage

        public PageView generatePage(android.content.Context context,
                             AppCMSPageUI appCMSPageUI,
                             AppCMSPageAPI appCMSPageAPI,
                             AppCMSAndroidModules appCMSAndroidModules,
                             java.lang.String screenName,
                             java.util.Map<java.lang.String,AppCMSUIKeyType> jsonValueKeyMap,
                             AppCMSPresenter appCMSPresenter,
                             java.util.List<java.lang.String> modulesToIgnore)
        This is the entry point for the creation of a new page that can be generated by ViewCreator.
        Parameters:
        context - This is the context value that created UI components should use
        appCMSPageUI - This is the Page UI response used for the creation of the UI
        appCMSPageAPI - This is the Page API data used to populate the UI fields specified by appCMSPageUI
        appCMSAndroidModules - This contains the individual block module definitions used for creating each UI element
        screenName - This is the screen name used to demarcate specific page landing events as well as distinguish this page from other types of screens
        jsonValueKeyMap - This is a hashmap that associates UI string values with value enumerations
        appCMSPresenter - This is a reference to the presenter class which handles all UI events including click events
        modulesToIgnore - This is a list of block modules that ViewCreator should ignore
        Returns:
        Returns a reference to a PageView View that may be rendered on the screen

      • getComponentViewResult

        ViewCreator.ComponentViewResult getComponentViewResult()

      • createPageView

        private void createPageView(android.content.Context context,
                            AppCMSPageUI appCMSPageUI,
                            AppCMSPageAPI appCMSPageAPI,
                            AppCMSAndroidModules appCMSAndroidModules,
                            PageView pageView,
                            java.util.Map<java.lang.String,AppCMSUIKeyType> jsonValueKeyMap,
                            AppCMSPresenter appCMSPresenter,
                            java.util.List<java.lang.String> modulesToIgnore)
        This creates the individual UI modules that make a PageView
        Parameters:
        context - This is the context value that created UI components should use
        appCMSPageUI - This is the Page UI response used for the creation of the UI
        appCMSPageAPI - This is the Page API data used to populate the UI fields specified by appCMSPageUI
        appCMSAndroidModules - This contains the individual block module definitions used for creating each UI element
        pageView - The PageView to use as the parent View Group for the created block modules
        jsonValueKeyMap - This is a hashmap that associates UI string values with value enumerations
        appCMSPresenter - This is a reference to the presenter class which handles all UI events including click events
        modulesToIgnore - This is a list of block modules that ViewCreator should ignore

      • createModuleView

        private <T extends ModuleWithComponents> android.view.View createModuleView(android.content.Context context,
                                                                            T module,
                                                                            Module moduleAPI,
                                                                            AppCMSAndroidModules appCMSAndroidModules,
                                                                            PageView pageView,
                                                                            java.util.Map<java.lang.String,AppCMSUIKeyType> jsonValueKeyMap,
                                                                            AppCMSPresenter appCMSPresenter)
        This creates an individual Module View that is
        Parameters:
        context - This is the context value that created UI components should use
        module - This is UI definition for the module that should be created
        moduleAPI - This is the API data that should be used to populate the UI fields
        appCMSAndroidModules - This contains the block modules definition
        pageView - This is the PageView that should be used as the ViewGroup container for the created module
        jsonValueKeyMap - This is a hashmap that associates UI string values with value enumerations
        appCMSPresenter - This is a reference to the presenter class which handles all UI events including click events
        Returns:
        Returns a ModuleView that will be added as a child view within the PageView ViewGroup

      • createCollectionGridItemView

        public CollectionGridItemView createCollectionGridItemView(android.content.Context context,
                                                           Layout parentLayout,
                                                           boolean useParentLayout,
                                                           Component component,
                                                           AppCMSPresenter appCMSPresenter,
                                                           Module moduleAPI,
                                                           AppCMSAndroidModules appCMSAndroidModules,
                                                           Settings settings,
                                                           java.util.Map<java.lang.String,AppCMSUIKeyType> jsonValueKeyMap,
                                                           int defaultWidth,
                                                           int defaultHeight,
                                                           boolean useMarginsAsPercentages,
                                                           boolean gridElement,
                                                           java.lang.String viewType,
                                                           boolean createMultipleContainersForChildren,
                                                           boolean createRoundedCorners)
        This method is used by Adapters for creating a component view.
        Parameters:
        context - This is the context value that created UI components should use
        parentLayout - This is the UI JSON layout object used by the parent ViewGroup
        useParentLayout - This flag should be set to true if this component should use the parent layout
        component - This is UI JSON component object that contains the information from AppCMS needed to create the component
        appCMSPresenter - This is the Presenter class used for handling all UI events including click events
        moduleAPI - This is the API data for the module that contains the data used for this component
        appCMSAndroidModules - This is the list of the Android block modules definitions used for creating each UI block type
        settings - This is the settings object from the module object that contains this object
        jsonValueKeyMap - This is a hashmap that associates UI string values with value enumerations
        defaultWidth - This is a default width for the component if the view width is not specified in the UI JSON response
        defaultHeight - This is a default height for the component if the view height is not specified in the UI JSON response
        useMarginsAsPercentages - This flag should be set to true if this component should interpret the margin as percentages instead of pixel values
        gridElement - This flag should be set to true if this component is a grid component and its values from come an array of values instead of a single element
        viewType - This is the component view type of the parent view and is used to infer additional view properties
        createMultipleContainersForChildren - This flag should be set to true if the parent view has multiple viewgroups as child layouts that a component may be placed in
        createRoundedCorners - This flag should be set to true if this component should have rounded corners (e.g. round corners in a CardView)
        Returns:
        Returns a CollectionGridItemView that may be bound to a view in a view adapter

      • createComponentView

        void createComponentView(android.content.Context context,
                         Component component,
                         Layout parentLayout,
                         Module moduleAPI,
                         AppCMSAndroidModules appCMSAndroidModules,
                         @Nullable
                         PageView pageView,
                         Settings settings,
                         java.util.Map<java.lang.String,AppCMSUIKeyType> jsonValueKeyMap,
                         AppCMSPresenter appCMSPresenter,
                         boolean gridElement,
                         java.lang.String viewType,
                         java.lang.String moduleId)
        This method is used to create an individual component view, which may by a recycler view, text view, button, image view, etc. The result is stored in the componentViewResult member object.
        Parameters:
        context - This is the context value that created UI components should use
        component - This is UI JSON component object that contains the information from AppCMS needed to create the component
        parentLayout - This is the UI JSON layout object used by the parent ViewGroup
        moduleAPI - This is the API data for the module that contains the data used for this component
        appCMSAndroidModules - This is the list of the Android block modules definitions used for creating each UI block type
        pageView - This is view used by the entire page and is used as a parent viewgroup for specific components that may be positioned anywhere on the page
        settings - This is the settings object from the module object that contains this object
        jsonValueKeyMap - This is a hashmap that associates UI string values with value enumerations
        appCMSPresenter - This is the Presenter class used for handling all UI events including click events
        gridElement - This flag should be set to true if this component is a grid component and its values from come an array of values instead of a single element
        viewType - This is the component view type of the parent view and is used to infer additional view properties
        moduleId - This is the module ID that associates

      • getColor

        public static java.lang.String getColor(android.content.Context context,
                                        java.lang.String color)
        This will prepend a '#' character to the beginning of a color string if one is missing.
        Parameters:
        context - This is the context value that created UI components should use
        color - This is the color string to prepend the '#' value
        Returns:
        A string value with one prepended '#' character

      • getColorWithOpacity

        public static java.lang.String getColorWithOpacity(android.content.Context context,
                                                   java.lang.String baseColorCode,
                                                   int opacityColorCode)
        This will prepend a '#' character and a hex value of the alpha or opacity value to a color string if the '#' character is missing
        Parameters:
        context - This is the context value that created UI components should use
        baseColorCode - This is the color string to prepend the '#' value and the alpha or opacity value
        opacityColorCode - This is the opacity value to prepend to the color value
        Returns:
        The original color value or a the color prepended with a '#' character followed by the alpha value

      • matchModuleAPIToModuleUI

        private Module matchModuleAPIToModuleUI(ModuleList module,
                                        AppCMSPageAPI appCMSPageAPI,
                                        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,AppCMSUIKeyType> jsonValueKeyMap)
        This will match a module from a UI JSON response to a module in a API data JSON response.
        Parameters:
        module - Module from a UI JSON response
        appCMSPageAPI - Module from an API data JSON response
        jsonValueKeyMap - This is a hashmap that associates UI string values with value enumerations
        Returns:
        A matching module UI JSON response to the input module API data JSON response

      • applyBorderToComponent

        private void applyBorderToComponent(android.content.Context context,
                                    android.view.View view,
                                    Component component,
                                    int forcedColor)
        This applies a visual border around an input view.
        Parameters:
        context - This is the context value that created UI components should use
        view - This is the view to apply the border
        component - This is the component object from the UI JSON response associated with the input view
        forcedColor - If this value does not equal -1 than this color will be applied to the border instead of the color specified in the component
